title: Define alert types and trigger conditions for fit drift, segment changes, and emerging high-fit cohorts

sections.text: Create a clear spec for alert categories (fit drift detection, segment membership changes, and newly emerging high-fit cohorts) including exact trigger logic, thresholds, evaluation cadence, and required inputs/signals. Document edge cases (missing data, low-volume segments, backfills) and expected alert payload fields for downstream delivery/UI. This ticket outputs an agreed-upon alert contract that engineering can implement and QA against in subsequent tickets.
